# selectedRow

**Instance Property**

The row number of the selected cell.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var selectedRow: Int { get }
```

## Discussion

When the value of this property is `–1`, no cells are selected. If cells in multiple rows are selected, the value of this property is the number of the last row containing a selected cell.

## Finding Cells

- **selectedCells**: An array containing all of the matrix’s highlighted cells plus its selected cell.
- **selectedColumn**: The column number of the selected cell.
- **cell(atRow:column:)**: Returns the cell at the specified row and column.
- **cell(withTag:)**: Searches the receiver and returns the last cell matching the specified tag.
- **cells**: An array containing the cells of the matrix.
